entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
